  • Constructor Details

    • Leds

      public Leds(int port, int length)
      Creates a new LED strip controller.
      Parameters:
      port - The PWM port the LED strip is connected to
      length - The number of LEDs in the strip

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the LED output. Must be called after configuration and before setting colors.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the LED output.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(int index, Color color)

    • setRGB

      public void setRGB(int index, int r, int g, int b)
      Sets the color of a specific LED.
      Parameters:
      index - The LED index
      r - Red value (0-255)
      g - Green value (0-255)
      b - Blue value (0-255)

    • setHSV

      public void setHSV(int index, int h, int s, int v)
      Sets the HSV color of a specific LED.
      Parameters:
      index - The LED index
      h - Hue (0-180)
      s - Saturation (0-255)
      v - Value (0-255) "Brightness" or "Value"

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the LED strip with the current buffer contents.

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Gets the length of the LED strip.
      Returns:
      The number of LEDs in the strip

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Gets the port number the LED strip is connected to.
      Returns:
      The PWM port number

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all LEDs by setting them to off (0,0,0).

    • createBufferView

      public AddressableLEDBufferView createBufferView(int startIndex, int length)
      Creates a view into a section of the LED strip.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - The starting LED index
      length - The number of LEDs in the view
      Returns:
      A new AddressableLEDBufferView

    • splitIntoSections

      public AddressableLEDBufferView[] splitIntoSections(int numSections)
      Creates multiple equal-sized views of the LED strip.
      Parameters:
      numSections - The number of sections to create
      Returns:
      Array of AddressableLEDBufferView objects

    • applyToView

      public void applyToView(AddressableLEDBufferView view, LEDPattern pattern)
      Applies a solid color to a specific buffer view.
      Parameters:
      view - The buffer view to apply the color to
      pattern - The pattern to apply to the view

    • applyToView

      public void applyToView(AddressableLEDBufferView view, int r, int g, int b)
      Applies a solid color to a specific buffer view.
      Parameters:
      view - The buffer view to apply the color to
      r - Red value (0-255)
      g - Green value (0-255)
      b - Blue value (0-255)

    • applyHSVToView

      public void applyHSVToView(AddressableLEDBufferView view, int h, int s, int v)
      Applies an HSV color to a specific buffer view.
      Parameters:
      view - The buffer view to apply the color to
      h - Hue (0-180)
      s - Saturation (0-255)
      v - Value/Brightness (0-255)

    • applyOperationToView

      public void applyOperationToView(AddressableLEDBufferView view, Leds.LEDOperation operation)
      Applies a custom operation to each LED in a buffer view.
      Parameters:
      view - The buffer view to apply the operation to
      operation - The operation to apply to each LED index

    • applyPattern

      public void applyPattern(AddressableLEDBufferView view, LEDPattern pattern)
      Applies a pattern to a specific buffer view.
      Parameters:
      view - The buffer view to apply the pattern to
      pattern - The pattern to apply to the view
